reciprocity_description: Fred relies on people who feel obligated to repay gifts and favours.
commitment_description: Fred is relying on people who tend to be more likely to follow through on commitments they have made in the past.
social_proof_description: Fred relies on people who look to others for cues to behave in a particular situation.
liking_description: Fred relies on people who are likelier to comply with requests from people they like or find attractive.
scarcity_description: Fred is relying on people who tend to value things more when they are scarce or in limited supply.
authority_description: Fred is relying on people who tend to be more likely to comply with requests from someone they perceive as an authority figure.
